adjective.description: Of or relating to the genus Monticulipora or related genera of massive stony colonial bryozoans found as fossils from early Palaeozoic times.

noun.description: A bryozoan of the group typified by the genus Monticulipora.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Henry Nicholson (1844–1899), biologist and geologist. From scientific Latin Monticulipora, genus name + -oid.
